name: Idle Mobs
description:
Idle Mobs is a simple, small idle game where you collect different cards!

If you liked the designs of these sprites and would like to use them for your own game, you can buy them at:

The wonderful music was used from this asset-pack:

https://alkakrab.itch.io/fantasy-rpg-soundtrack-music

And the upgrade sound was used from here:

https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/bag-of-coins-100423/
